title: 원어민 반응 - 실망과 아쉬움
description: 자연스러운 실망과 아쉬움을 표현하는 원어민 수준의 반응 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: Oh, what a shame. I was really looking forward to it.
That's such a pity. I didn't see this coming.
Aw, what a letdown. This is totally below expectations.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 실망과 아쉬움 표현 구사

sentences.en: Oh, what a shame. I was really looking forward to it.

sentences.kr: 참, 안타깝네. 이렇게 될 줄 몰랐어.
sentences.en: That's such a pity. I didn't see this coming.
Aw, what a letdown. This is totally below expectations.
That's frustrating. This isn't how it should be.

sentences.kr: 정말 김이 빠지네. 완전히 다른 걸 예상했었어.
sentences.en: That really takes the wind out of my sails. I expected something completely different.

sentences.kr: 아쉽긴 하지만, 어쩔 수 없지 뭐.
sentences.en: It's disappointing, but I guess there's nothing we can do about it.
Darn, this isn't the outcome I was hoping for.

sentences.kr: 정말 아깝다. 조금만 더 했으면 됐을 텐데.
sentences.en: What a waste. We were so close to making it work.
